# Required packages for DesktopMatePort on Debian/Ubuntu
# Core dependencies
winehq-staging
python3
zenity
wget
wmctrl
cpulimit

# Graphics and desktop integration
mesa-utils
mesa-vulkan-drivers
vulkan-tools
xdg-utils

# Audio support
pulseaudio
pulseaudio-utils

# Development tools (needed for some operations)
build-essential
git

# KDE integration (for KDE users)
libkf5windowsystem5
libkf5wayland-dev

# Wayland support
libwayland-dev
wayland-protocols

# Additional dependencies for better compatibility
cabextract
p7zip-full
unzip
